page.title: 10Leisure activities.
page.content: There are a number of ways that people can spend their leisure time in the local area. Most of the men in Chilton go to the 'Chilton and Windlestone Working men's Club' in their spare time. Here they can relax or play snooker or billiards. The women can play Bingo in the club and on certain nights there is a disco. Our local junior school is used by the Community Association and is called the Community College. On an evening adults can go to the Social Club here. If they like sport they can play such games as squash and badminton. Cricket and football can be played on the field at the back of the College. Jogging and walking are popular pastimes as is allotment gardening.
